actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow small businesses to treat for purposes of the deduction for depreciation $100,000 of property placed in service during each taxable year as having a useful life of 3 years.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit taxpayers to elect to depreciate tangible personal property with a basis of less than $100,000 on a 36 month basis under the straight line method.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow small businesses to treat for purposes of the deduction for depreciation $100,000 of property placed in service during each taxable year as having a useful life of 3 years.
